trans-unit.source: Regular expression options
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式选项

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET、.NET Core

trans-unit.source: Regular expression options
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式选项

trans-unit.source: By default, the comparison of an input string with any literal characters in a regular expression pattern is case sensitive, white space in a regular expression pattern is interpreted as literal white-space characters, and capturing groups in a regular expression are named implicitly as well as explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，正则表达式模式中带有任意文本字符的输入字符串比较区分大小写，正则表达式模式中的空白将被解释为文本空白字符且正则表达式中的捕获组通过隐式和显式命名。

trans-unit.source: You can modify these and several other aspects of default regular expression behavior by specifying regular expression options.
trans-unit.target: 可通过指定正则表达式选项修改默认正则表达式行为的这些和其他数个方面。

trans-unit.source: These options, which are listed in the following table, can be included inline as part of the regular expression pattern, or they can be supplied to a [System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) class constructor or static pattern matching method as a [System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 列于下表的这些选项，可将内联作为正则表达式的一部分包含，或者可将它们作为 [System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) 枚举值提供给 [System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 类构造函数或静态模式匹配方法。

trans-unit.source: RegexOptions member
trans-unit.target: RegexOptions 成员

trans-unit.source: Inline character
trans-unit.target: 内联字符

trans-unit.source: Effect
trans-unit.target: 效果

trans-unit.source: [None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None)
trans-unit.target: [无](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None)

trans-unit.source: Not available
trans-unit.target: 不可用

trans-unit.source: Use default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认行为。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default options](#default-options).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 [默认选项](#default-options)。

trans-unit.source: [IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase)
trans-unit.target: [IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase)

trans-unit.source: Use case-insensitive matching.
trans-unit.target: 使用不区分大小写的匹配。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Case-insensitive matching](#case-insensitive-matching).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 [不区分大小写的匹配](#case-insensitive-matching)。

trans-unit.source: [Multiline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline)
trans-unit.target: [多行](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline)

trans-unit.source: Use multiline mode, where **^** and **$** match the beginning and end of each line (instead of the beginning and end of the input string).
trans-unit.target: 使用多线模式，其中 **^** 和 **$** 匹配每行的开头和末尾（不是输入字符串的开头和末尾）。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Multiline mode](#multiline-mode).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见[多行模式](#multiline-mode)。

trans-unit.source: [Singleline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Singleline)
trans-unit.target: [单行](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Singleline)

trans-unit.source: Use single-line mode, where the period (**.**) matches every character (instead of every character except **\n**).
trans-unit.target: 使用单行模式，其中的句号 (**.**) 匹配每个字符（而不是除了 **\n** 以外的每个字符）。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Single-line mode](#single-line-mode).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见[单行模式](#single-line-mode)。

trans-unit.source: [ExplicitCapture](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture)
trans-unit.target: [ExplicitCapture](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture)

trans-unit.source: Do not capture unnamed groups.
trans-unit.target: 不捕获未命名的组。

trans-unit.source: The only valid captures are explicitly named or numbered groups of the form **(?<**_name_**>** _subexpression_**)**.
trans-unit.target: 唯一有效的捕获是显式命名或编号的 **(?<**_name_**>** _subexpression_**)** 形式的组。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Explicit captures only](#explicit-captures-only).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见[仅显式捕获](#explicit-captures-only)。

trans-unit.source: [Compiled](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled)
trans-unit.target: [已编译](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled)

trans-unit.source: Not available
trans-unit.target: 不可用

trans-unit.source: Compile the regular expression to an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 将正则表达式编译为程序集。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Compiled regular expressions](#compiled-regular-expressions).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见[已编译的正则表达式](#compiled-regular-expressions)。

trans-unit.source: [IgnorePatternWhitespace](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace)
trans-unit.target: [IgnorePatternWhitespace](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace)

trans-unit.source: Exclude unescaped white space from the pattern, and enable comments after a number sign (**#**).
trans-unit.target: 从模式中排除保留的空白并启用数字符号 (**#**) 后的注释。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ignore white space](#ignore-white-space).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见[忽略空白](#ignore-white-space)。

trans-unit.source: [RightToLeft](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft)
trans-unit.target: [RightToLeft](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft)

trans-unit.source: Not available
trans-unit.target: 不可用

trans-unit.source: Change the search direction.
trans-unit.target: 更改搜索方向。

trans-unit.source: Search moves from right to left instead of from left to right.
trans-unit.target: 搜索是从右向左而不是从左向右进行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Right-to-left mode](#right-to-left-mode).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见[从右向左模式](#right-to-left-mode)。

trans-unit.source: [ECMAScript](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ECMAScript)
trans-unit.target: [ECMAScript](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ECMAScript)

trans-unit.source: Not available
trans-unit.target: 不可用

trans-unit.source: Enable ECMAScript-compliant behavior for the expression.
trans-unit.target: 为表达式启用符合 ECMAScript 的行为。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ECMAScript matching behavior](#ecmascript-matching-behavior).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 [ECMAScript 匹配行为](#ecmascript-matching-behavior)。

trans-unit.source: [CultureInvariant](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.CultureInvariant)
trans-unit.target: [CultureInvariant](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.CultureInvariant)

trans-unit.source: Not available
trans-unit.target: 不可用

trans-unit.source: Ignore cultural differences in language.
trans-unit.target: 忽略语言的区域性差异。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Comparison using the invariant culture](#comparison-using-the-invariant-culture).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见[使用固定区域性的比较](#comparison-using-the-invariant-culture)。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the options
trans-unit.target: 指定选项

trans-unit.source: You can specify options for regular expressions in one of three ways:
trans-unit.target: 可以用下面三种方法之一指定正则表达式的选项：

trans-unit.source: In the *options* parameter of a [System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) class constructor such as [Regex.Regex(String, RegexOptions)](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor(System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions)) or static (Shared in Visual Basic) pattern-matching method, such as [Regex.Match(String, String, RegexOptions)](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions)).
trans-unit.target: 在 [System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 类构造函数（如 [Regex.Regex(String, RegexOptions)](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.%23ctor(System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions))）或静态（在 Visual Basic 中为 Shared）模式匹配方法的 options 参数中，如 [Regex.Match(String, String, RegexOptions)](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions))。

trans-unit.source: The *options* parameter is a bitwise OR combination of [System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) enumerated values.
trans-unit.target: options 参数是 [System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) 枚举值的按位 OR 组合。

trans-unit.source: When options are supplied to a [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) instance by using the *options* parameter of a class constructor, the options are are assigned to the [System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) property.
trans-unit.target: 当通过使用类构造函数的 options 参数，将选项提供给 [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 实例时，这些选项将分配给 [System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) 属性。

trans-unit.source: However, the [System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) property does not reflect inline options in the regular expression pattern itself.
trans-unit.target: 然而，[System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) 属性不会在正则表达式模式本身中反映内联选项。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例进行了这方面的演示。

trans-unit.source: It uses the *options* parameter of the [Regex.Match(String, String, RegexOptions)](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions)) method to enable case-insensitive matching and to ignore pattern white space when identifying words that begin with the letter "d".
trans-unit.target: 在标识以字母“d”开头的单词时，它使用 [Regex.Match(String, String, RegexOptions)](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions)) 方法的 options 参数来启用不区分大小写匹配和忽略模式空白。

trans-unit.source: By applying inline options in a regular expression pattern with the syntax **(?imnsx-imnsx)**.
trans-unit.target: 通过在包含语法 **(?imnsx-imnsx)** 的正则表达式模式中应用内联选项。

trans-unit.source: The option applies to the pattern from the point that the option is defined to either the end of the pattern or to the point at which the option is undefined by another inline option.
trans-unit.target: 该选项从选项定义为模式末尾的点应用于该模式，或应用于另一内联选项未定义选项的点。

trans-unit.source: Note that the [System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) property of a [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) instance does not reflect these inline options.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，[Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 实例的 [System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) 属性不会反映这些内联选项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Miscellaneous constructs in regular expressions](miscellaneous.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见[正则表达式中的其他构造](miscellaneous.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例进行了这方面的演示。

trans-unit.source: It uses inline options to enable case-insensitive matching and to ignore pattern white space when identifying words that begin with the letter "d".
trans-unit.target: 在标识以字母“d”开头的单词时，它使用内联选项来启用不区分大小写匹配和忽略模式空白。

trans-unit.source: By applying inline options in a particular grouping construct in a regular expression pattern with the syntax **(?imnsx-imnsx:**_subexpression_**)**.
trans-unit.target: 通过在包含语法 **(?imnsx-imnsx:**_subexpression_**)** 的正则表达式模式的特定分组构造中，应用内联选项。

trans-unit.source: No sign before a set of options turns the set on; a minus sign before a set of options turns the set off.
trans-unit.target: 一组选项前面没有符号用于打开该设置；一组选项前面的减号用于关闭该设置。

trans-unit.source: is a fixed part of the language construct's syntax that is required whether options are enabled or disabled.) The option applies only to that group.
trans-unit.target: 是所需的语言构造语法的固定部分，无论选项是启用还是禁用。）选项只应用于该组。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Grouping constructs in regular expressions](grouping.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见[正则表达式中的分组构造](grouping.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例进行了这方面的演示。

trans-unit.source: It uses inline options in a grouping construct to enable case-insensitive matching and to ignore pattern white space when identifying words that begin with the letter "d".
trans-unit.target: 在标识以字母“d”开头的单词时，它使用分组构造中的内联选项来启用不区分大小写匹配和忽略模式空白。

trans-unit.source: If options are specified inline, a minus sign (-) before an option or set of options turns off those options.
trans-unit.target: 如果选项指定为内联，一个选项或一组选项前面的减号 (-) 用于关闭这些选项。

trans-unit.source: For example, the inline construct **(?ix-ms)** turns on the [RegexOptions.IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase) and [RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace) options and turns off the [RegexOptions.Multiline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline) and [RegexOptions.Singleline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Singleline) options.
trans-unit.target: 例如，内联构造 **(?ix-ms)** 将打开 [RegexOptions.IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase) 和 [RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace) 选项而关闭 [RegexOptions.Multiline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline) 和 [RegexOptions.Singleline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Singleline) 选项。

trans-unit.source: All regular expression options are turned off by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，关闭所有正则表达式选项。

trans-unit.source: If the regular expression options specified in the options parameter of a constructor or method call conflict with the options specified inline in a regular expression pattern, the inline options are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果构造函数或方法调用的 options 参数中指定的正则表达式选项与正则表达式模式中的内联指定的选项冲突，那么将使用该内联选项。

trans-unit.source: The following five regular expression options can be set both with the *options* parameter and inline:
trans-unit.target: 可为下面的五个正则表达式选项同时设置 options 参数和内联：

trans-unit.source: [RegexOptions.IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase)
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase)

trans-unit.source: [RegexOptions.Multiline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline)
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.Multiline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline)

trans-unit.source: [RegexOptions.Singleline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Singleline)
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.Singleline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Singleline)

trans-unit.source: [RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture)
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture)

trans-unit.source: [RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace)
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace)

trans-unit.source: The following five regular expression options can be set using the *options* parameter but cannot be set inline:
trans-unit.target: 可为下面的五个正则表达式选项设置使用 options 参数，但不能为其设置内联：

trans-unit.source: [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None)
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None)

trans-unit.source: [RegexOptions.Compiled](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled)
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.Compiled](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled)

trans-unit.source: [RegexOptions.RightToLeft](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft)
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.RightToLeft](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft)

trans-unit.source: [RegexOptions.CultureInvariant](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.CultureInvariant)
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.CultureInvariant](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.CultureInvariant)

trans-unit.source: [RegexOptions.ECMAScript](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ECMAScript)
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.ECMAScript](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ECMAScript)

trans-unit.source: Determining the options
trans-unit.target: 确定选项

trans-unit.source: You can determine which options were provided to a [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) object when it was instantiated by retrieving the value of the read-only [Regex.Options](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Options) property.
trans-unit.target: 可以确定向 [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 对象提供哪些选项，在通过检索只读 [Regex.Options](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Options) 属性的值将其实例化时。

trans-unit.source: To test for the presence of any option except [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None), perform an AND operation with the value of the [Regex.Options](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Options) property and the [RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) value in which you are interested.
trans-unit.target: 要测试除 [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None) 之外的任何选项的存在，使用 [Regex.Options](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Options) 属性的值和需要的 [RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) 值执行 AND 运算。

trans-unit.source: Then test whether the result equals that [RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) value.
trans-unit.target: 然后测试结果是否等于该 [RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) 值。

trans-unit.source: The following example tests whether the [RegexOptions.IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase) option has been set.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例测试是否设置了 [RegexOptions.IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase) 选项。

trans-unit.source: To test for [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None), determine whether the value of the [RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) property is equal to [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None), as the following example illustrates.
trans-unit.target: 若要测试 [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None)，请确定 [RegexOptions](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions) 属性的值是否等于 [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None)，如下面的示例所示。

trans-unit.source: The following sections list the options supported by regular expression in .NET.
trans-unit.target: 下面的部分列出了 .NET 中正则表达式支持的选项。

trans-unit.source: Default options
trans-unit.target: 默认选项

trans-unit.source: The [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None) option indicates that no options have been specified, and the regular expression engine uses its default behavior.
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None) 选项指示尚未指定任何选项，正则表达式引擎使用其默认行为。

trans-unit.source: This includes the following:
trans-unit.target: 这包括：

trans-unit.source: The pattern is interpreted as a canonical rather than an ECMAScript regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 该模式将被解释为一个规范而非 ECMAScript 正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is matched in the input string from left to right.
trans-unit.target: 从左到右在输入字符串中匹配的正则表达式模式。

trans-unit.source: Comparisons are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 比较区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The **^** and **$** language elements match the beginning and end of the input string.
trans-unit.target: **^** 和 **$** 语言元素与输入字符串的开头和结尾匹配。

trans-unit.source: language element matches every character except **\n**.
trans-unit.target: 语言元素与除 **\n** 之外的每个字符匹配。

trans-unit.source: Any white space in a regular expression pattern is interpreted as a literal space character.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式中的任意空白均解释为文本空白字符。

trans-unit.source: The conventions of the current culture are used when comparing the pattern to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 将模式与输入字符串进行比较时将使用当前区域性的约定。

trans-unit.source: Capturing groups in the regular expression pattern are implicit as well as explicit.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式中的捕获组可以是隐式的，也可以是显式的。

trans-unit.source: The [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None) option has no inline equivalent.
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None) 选项没有内联等效项。

trans-unit.source: When regular expression options are applied inline, the default behavior is restored on an option-by-option basis, by turning a particular option off.
trans-unit.target: 当内联应用正则表达式选项时，默认行为通过关闭特定选项以逐个选项方式存储。

trans-unit.source: For example, `(?i)` turns on case-insensitive comparison, and `(?-i)` restores the default case-sensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 例如， `(?i)` 打开不区分大小写的比较，`(?-i)` 还原默认区分大小写的比较。

trans-unit.source: Because the [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None) option represents the default behavior of the regular expression engine, it is rarely explicitly specified in a method call.
trans-unit.target: 因为 [RegexOptions.None](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.None) 选项表示正则表达式引擎的默认行为，因此它很少显式地在方法调用中指定。

trans-unit.source: A constructor or static pattern-matching method without an options parameter is called instead.
trans-unit.target: 而改为调用构造函数或静态模式匹配的方法，其中不包含 options 参数。

trans-unit.source: Case-insensitive matching
trans-unit.target: 不区分大小写的匹配

trans-unit.source: The [RegexOptions.IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase) option, or the **i** inline option, provides case-insensitive matching.
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase) 选项或 **i** 内联选项提供了不区分大小写匹配。

trans-unit.source: By default, the casing conventions of the current culture are used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用当前区域性的大小写约定。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a regular expression pattern, `\bthe\w*\b`, that matches all words starting with "the".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义与以“the”开头的所有单词匹配的正则表达式模式 `\bthe\w*\b`。

trans-unit.source: Because the first call to the Match method uses the default case-sensitive comparison, the output indicates that the string "The" that begins the sentence is not matched.
trans-unit.target: 因为对 Match 方法的第一次调用使用默认区分大小写的比较，因此输出会指示以字符串“The”开头的句子不匹配。

trans-unit.source: It is matched when the [Match](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions)) method is called with options set to [IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase).
trans-unit.target: 通过将选项设置为 [IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase)，调用 [Match](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions)) 方法时对其进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: The following example modifies the regular expression pattern from the previous example to use inline options instead of the *options* parameter to provide case-insensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例修改了上一示例中的正则表达式模式，以使用内联选项而不是 options 参数来提供不区分大小写的比较。

trans-unit.source: The first pattern defines the case-insensitive option in a grouping construct that applies only to the letter "t" in the string "the".
trans-unit.target: 第一个模式定义只应用于字符串“the”中的字母“t”的分组构造中的不区分大小写的选项。

trans-unit.source: Because the option construct occurs at the beginning of the pattern, the second pattern applies the case-insensitive option to the entire regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 因为选项构造在模式的开始处出现，所以第二个模式将不区分大小写的选项应用于整个正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Multiline mode
trans-unit.target: 多行模式

trans-unit.source: The [RegexOptions.Multiline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline) option, or the **m** inline option, enables the regular expression engine to handle an input string that consists of multiple lines.
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.Multiline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline) 选项或 **m** 内联选项使正则表达式引擎能够处理由多个行组成的输入字符串。

trans-unit.source: It changes the interpretation of the **^** and **$** language elements so that they match the beginning and end of a line, instead of the beginning and end of the input string.
trans-unit.target: 它更改了 **^** 和 **$** 语言元素的解释，以使它们分别与行的开头和结尾匹配，而不是与输入字符串的开头和结尾匹配。

trans-unit.source: By default, **$** matches only the end of the input string.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，**$** 仅与输入字符串的末尾匹配。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the [RegexOptions.Multiline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline) option, it matches either the newline character **(\n)** or the end of the input string.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 [RegexOptions.Multiline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline) 选项，它将与换行符 **(\n)** 或输入字符串的末尾匹配。

trans-unit.source: It does not, however, match the carriage return/line feed character combination.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它并不与回车符/换行符的组合匹配。

trans-unit.source: To successfully match them, use the subexpression **\r?$** instead of just **$**.
trans-unit.target: 若要成功匹配它们，使用子表达式 **\r?$** 只替代 **$**。

trans-unit.source: The following example extracts bowlers names and scores and adds them to a [SortedList<TKey, TValue>](xref:System.Collections.Generic.SortedList%602) collection that sorts them in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例提取投手的姓名和分数，并将它们添加到 [SortedList<TKey, TValue>](xref:System.Collections.Generic.SortedList%602) 集合中，该集合将按降序顺序对它们进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The [Matches](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches(System.String)) method is called twice.
trans-unit.target: 调用了两次 [Matches](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Matches(System.String)) 方法。

trans-unit.source: In the first method call, the regular expression is `^(\w+)\s(\d+)$` and no options are set.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个方法调用中，正则表达式是 `^(\w+)\s(\d+)$`，且没有设置任何选项。

trans-unit.source: As the output shows, because the regular expression engine cannot match the input pattern along with the beginning and end of the input string, no matches are found.
trans-unit.target: 如输出所示，因为正则表达式引擎与输入模式及输入字符串的开头和结尾均不匹配，因此没有找到匹配。

trans-unit.source: In the second method call, the regular expression is changed to `^(\w+)\s(\d+)\r?$` and the options are set to [RegexOptions.Multiline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline).
trans-unit.target: 在第二个方法调用中，正则表达式更改为 `^(\w+)\s(\d+)\r?$`，选项设置为 [RegexOptions.Multiline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline)。

trans-unit.source: As the output shows, the names and scores are successfully matched, and the scores are displayed in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 如输出所示，姓名和分数成功匹配，且分数按降序顺序显示。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern `^(\w+)\s(\d+)\r*$` is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式 `^(\w+)\s(\d+)\r*$` 的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Begin at the start of the line.
trans-unit.target: 从行首开始。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more word characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个或多个单词字符。

trans-unit.source: This is the first capturing group.
trans-unit.target: 这是第一个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: Match a white-space character.
trans-unit.target: 与空白字符匹配。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个或多个十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: This is the second capturing group.
trans-unit.target: 这是第二个捕获组。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one carriage return character.
trans-unit.target: 与零个或一个回车符匹配。

trans-unit.source: End at the end of the line.
trans-unit.target: 在行尾结束。

trans-unit.source: The following example is equivalent to the previous one, except that it uses the inline option **(?m)** to set the multiline option.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例与上一示例等效，不同之处是下面的示例使用内联选项 **(?m)** 来设置多行选项。

trans-unit.source: Single-line mode
trans-unit.target: 单行模式

trans-unit.source: The [RegexOptions.Singleline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Singleline) option, or the s inline option, causes the regular expression engine to treat the input string as if it consists of a single line.
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.Singleline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Singleline) 选项或 s 内联选项导致正则表达式引擎将输入字符串视为由单行组成。

trans-unit.source: It does this by changing the behavior of the period (**.**) language element so that it matches every character, instead of matching every character except for the newline character **\n** or \u000A.
trans-unit.target: 它通过更改句点 (**.**) 语言元素的行为，使其与每个字符匹配，而不是与除换行符 **\n** 或 \u000A 之外的每个字符匹配来执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how the behavior of the .
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了在使用

trans-unit.source: language element changes when you use the [RegexOptions.Singleline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Singleline) option.
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.Singleline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Singleline) 选项时如何更改 . 语言元素的行为。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression `^.+` starts at the beginning of the string and matches every character.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式 `^.+` 在字符串开头开始并匹配每个字符。

trans-unit.source: By default, the match ends at the end of the first line; the regular expression pattern matches the carriage return character, **\r** or \u000D, but it does not match **\n**.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，匹配在第一行的结尾结束；正则表达式模式匹配回车符、**\r** 或 \u000D，但不匹配 **\n**。

trans-unit.source: Because the [RegexOptions.Singleline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Singleline) option interprets the entire input string as a single line, it matches every character in the input string, including **\n**.
trans-unit.target: 由于 [RegexOptions.Singleline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Singleline) 选项将整个输入字符串解释为单行，因此它匹配输入字符串中的每个字符，包括 **\n**。

trans-unit.source: The following example is equivalent to the previous one, except that it uses the inline option **(?s)** to enable single-line mode.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例与上一示例等效，不同之处是下面的示例使用内联选项 **(?s)** 来启用单行模式。

trans-unit.source: Explicit captures only
trans-unit.target: 仅显式捕获

trans-unit.source: By default, capturing groups are defined by the use of parentheses in the regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，通过在正则表达式模式中使用括号来定义捕获组。

trans-unit.source: Named groups are assigned a name or number by the **(?<**_name_**>** _subexpression_**)** language option, whereas unnamed groups are accessible by index.
trans-unit.target: 通过 **(?<**_name_**>** _subexpression_**)** 语言选项为命名组指定名称或编号，而未命名组按索引进行访问。

trans-unit.source: In the [GroupCollection](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection) object, unnamed groups precede named groups.
trans-unit.target: 在 [GroupCollection](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection) 对象中，未命名的组先于已命名的组。

trans-unit.source: Grouping constructs are often used only to apply quantifiers to multiple language elements, and the captured substrings are of no interest.
trans-unit.target: 分组构造通常仅用于将限定符应用于多个语言元素，而非应用于捕获的子字符串。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the following regular expression:
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果下面的正则表达式：

trans-unit.source: is intended only to extract sentences that end with a period, exclamation point, or question mark from a document, only the resulting sentence (which is represented by the [Match](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match) object) is of interest.
trans-unit.target: 旨在仅从文档提取末尾有句号、感叹点或问号的句子，仅产生的句子（这由 [Match](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match) 对象表示）有意义。

trans-unit.source: The individual words in the collection are not.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的各单词不是。

trans-unit.source: Capturing groups that are not subsequently used can be expensive, because the regular expression engine must populate both the [GroupCollection](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection) and [CaptureCollection](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.CaptureCollection) collection objects.
trans-unit.target: 随后未使用的捕获组可能很昂贵，因为正则表达式引擎必须填充 [GroupCollection](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection) 和 [CaptureCollection](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.CaptureCollection) 集合对象。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can use either the [RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture) option or the **n** inline option to specify that the only valid captures are explicitly named or numbered groups that are designated by the **(?<**_name_**>** _subexpression_**)** construct.
trans-unit.target: 或者，也可以使用 [RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture) 选项或 **n** 内联选项，来指定显式命名的唯一有效捕获或由 **(?<**_name_**>** _subexpression_**)** 构造指定的已编号的组。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays information about the matches returned by the `\b\(?((\w+),?\s?)+[\.!?]\)?` regular expression pattern when the [Match](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(System.String,System.Int32)) method is called with and without the [RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture) option.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例显示 `\b\(?((\w+),?\s?)+[\.!?]\)?` 正则表达式模式在 [Match](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(System.String,System.Int32)) 方法被调用且没有 [RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture) 选项时返回的匹配信息。

trans-unit.source: As the output from the first method call shows, the regular expression engine fully populates the [GroupCollection](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection) and [CaptureCollection](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.CaptureCollection) collection objects with information about captured substrings.
trans-unit.target: 如第一个方法调用输出所示，正则表达式引擎使用有关已捕获的子字符串的信息完全填充 [GroupCollection](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.GroupCollection) 和 [CaptureCollection](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.CaptureCollection) 集合对象。

trans-unit.source: Because the second method is called with options set to [RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture), it does not capture information on groups.
trans-unit.target: 因为第二个方法使用设置为 [RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture) 的 options 进行调用，所以它不会捕获有关组的信息。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern `\b\(?((?>\w+),?\s?)+[\.!?]\)?` is defined as shown in the following table.
Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: Begin at a word boundary.
trans-unit.target: 在单词边界处开始。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one occurrences of the opening parenthesis ("(").
trans-unit.target: 匹配左括号（“(”）的零或一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more word characters, followed by zero or one commas.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个或多个单词字符，后跟零或一个逗号。

trans-unit.source: Do not backtrack when matching word characters.
trans-unit.target: 当匹配单词字符请不要回溯。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或一个空白字符。

trans-unit.source: Match the combination of one or more word characters, zero or one commas, and zero or one white-space characters one or more times.
trans-unit.target: 一次或多次匹配一个或多个单词字符、零或一个逗号以及零或一个空白字符的组合。

trans-unit.source: Match any of the three punctuation symbols, followed by zero or one closing parentheses (")").
trans-unit.target: 与后无右括号或后跟一个右括号（“)”）的三个标点符号匹配。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the **(?n)** inline element to suppress automatic captures.
trans-unit.target: 还可以使用 **(?n)** 内联元素来禁止自动捕获。

trans-unit.source: The following example modifies the previous regular expression pattern to use the **(?n)** inline element instead of the [RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture) option.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例修改了上一示例中的正则表达式模式，使用的是内联元素 **(?n)** 而非 [RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture) 选项。

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can use the inline group element **(?n:)** to suppress automatic captures on a group-by-group basis.
trans-unit.target: 最后，可以使用内联组元素 **(?n:)** 禁止逐组进行自动捕获。

trans-unit.source: The following example modifies the previous pattern to suppress unnamed captures in the outer group, `((?>\w+),?\s?)`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例修改了之前的模式，以取消外部组 `((?>\w+),?\s?)` 中的非命名捕获。

trans-unit.source: Note that this suppresses unnamed captures in the inner group as well.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这也取消了内部组中的非命名捕获。

trans-unit.source: Compiled regular expressions
trans-unit.target: 已编译的正则表达式

trans-unit.source: By default, regular expressions in .NET are interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，.NET 中的正则表达式会有解释。

trans-unit.source: When a [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) object is instantiated or a static [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) method is called, the regular expression pattern is parsed into a set of custom opcodes, and an interpreter uses these opcodes to run the regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 当实例化 [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 对象或者调用静态 [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 方法时，将把正则表达式模式解析为一组自定义操作代码，并且解释器使用这些操作代码来运行正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: This involves a tradeoff: The cost of initializing the regular expression engine is minimized at the expense of run-time performance.
trans-unit.target: 这涉及一个权衡：初始化正则表达式引擎的成本通过运行时性能的消耗而最小化。

trans-unit.source: You can use compiled instead of interpreted regular expressions by using the [RegexOptions.Compiled](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled) option.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 [RegexOptions.Compiled](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled) 选项可以使用编译的而非解释的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: In this case, when a pattern is passed to the regular expression engine, it is parsed into a set of opcodes and then converted to Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), which can be passed directly to the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，当模式传递给正则表达式引擎时，它将分析为一组操作码，然后转换为 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，该语言可以被直接传递到公共语言运行时。

trans-unit.source: Compiled regular expressions maximize run-time performance at the expense of initialization time.
trans-unit.target: 已编译的正则表达式最大限度地提高运行时性能，代价是会影响初始化时间。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression can be compiled only by supplying the [RegexOptions.Compiled](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled) value to the options parameter of a [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) class constructor or a static pattern-matching method.
trans-unit.target: 仅可以通过将 [RegexOptions.Compiled](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled) 值提供给 [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 类构造函数或静态模式匹配方法的 options 参数来编译正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: It is not available as an inline option.
trans-unit.target: 它不可作为内联选项使用。

trans-unit.source: You can use compiled regular expressions in calls to both static and instance regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 在调用静态和实例正则表达式时，可使用编译的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: In static regular expressions, the [RegexOptions.Compiled](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled) option is passed to the options parameter of the regular expression pattern-matching method.
trans-unit.target: 在静态正则表达式中，[RegexOptions.Compiled](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Compiled) 选项将传递到正则表达式模式匹配方法的 options 参数。

trans-unit.source: In instance regular expressions, it is passed to the options parameter of the [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在实例正则表达式中，将它传递到 [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 类构造函数的 options 参数。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, it results in enhanced performance.
trans-unit.target: 在这两种情况中它将导致性能增强。

trans-unit.source: However, this improvement in performance occurs only under the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 但是，这种性能改进只有在以下情况下才发生：

trans-unit.source: A [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) object that represents a particular regular expression is used in multiple calls to regular expression pattern-matching methods.
trans-unit.target: 表示特定正则表达式的 [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 对象可用于多个正则表达式模式匹配方法调用。

trans-unit.source: The [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) object is not allowed to go out of scope, so it can be reused.
trans-unit.target: 不允许 [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 对象超出范围，以便可以重用它。

trans-unit.source: A static regular expression is used in multiple calls to regular expression pattern-matching methods.
trans-unit.target: 静态正则表达式在对正则表达式模式匹配方法的多个调用中使用。

trans-unit.source: (The performance improvement is possible because regular expressions used in static method calls are cached by the regular expression engine.)
trans-unit.target: （之所以能够提高性能，是因为静态方法调用中使用的正则表达式由正则表达式引擎缓存。）

trans-unit.source: Ignore white space
trans-unit.target: 忽略空白

trans-unit.source: By default, white space in a regular expression pattern is significant; it forces the regular expression engine to match a white-space character in the input string.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，正则表达式模式中的空白非常重要；它会强制正则表达式引擎与输入字符串中的空白字符相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the regular expression `"\b\w+\s"` and `"\b\w+ "` are roughly equivalent regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 因此，正则表达式 `"\b\w+\s"` 和 `"\b\w+ "` 是大致等效的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: In addition, when the number sign (**#**) is encountered in a regular expression pattern, it is interpreted as a literal character to be matched.
trans-unit.target: 此外，正则表达式模式中出现数字符号 (**#**) 时，它被解释为要进行匹配的原义字符。

trans-unit.source: The [RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace) option, or the **x** inline option, changes this default behavior as follows:
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace) 选项或 **x** 内联选项更改此默认行为，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Unescaped white space in the regular expression pattern is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式中的非转义的空白将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: To be part of a regular expression pattern, white-space characters must be escaped (for example, as **\s** or "**\** ").
trans-unit.target: 作为正则表达式模式的部分，空白字符必须避开（例如 **\s** 或“**\** ”）。

trans-unit.source: The number sign (**#**) is interpreted as the beginning of a comment, rather than as a literal character.
trans-unit.target: 数字符号 (**#**) 被解释为注释的开头，而不是原义字符。

trans-unit.source: All text in the regular expression pattern from the **#** character to the end of the string is interpreted as a comment.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式中的所有文本，从 **#** 字符到字符串的结尾都解释为注释。

trans-unit.source: However, in the following cases, white space characters in a regular expression aren't ignored, even if you use the [RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace) option:
trans-unit.target: 但是，在下列情况下，不会忽略正则表达式中的空白字符，即使使用 [RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace) 选项也是如此：

trans-unit.source: White space within a character class is always interpreted literally.
trans-unit.target: 始终按原义解释字符内的空格。

trans-unit.source: For example, the regular expression pattern `[ .,;:]` matches any single white-space character, period, comma, semicolon, or colon.
trans-unit.target: 例如，正则表达式模式 `[ .,;:]` 匹配任意单个空白字符、句号、逗号、分号或冒号。

trans-unit.source: White space isn't allowed within a bracketed quantifier, such as **{**_n_**}**, **{**_n_**,}**, and **{**_n_**,**_m_**}**.
For example, the regular expression pattern **\d{1. 3}** fails to match any sequences of digits from one to three digits because it contains a white-space character.
trans-unit.target: 例如，因为它包含一个空白字符，所以正则表达式模式 **\d{1. 3}** 与任何从 1 到 3 位数的数字序列不匹配。

trans-unit.source: White space isn't allowed within a character sequence that introduces a language element.
trans-unit.target: 引入语言元素的字符序列内不允许有空格。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: The language element **(?:**_subexpression_**)** represents a noncapturing group, and the **(?:** portion of the element can't have embedded spaces.
trans-unit.target: 语言元素 **(?:**_subexpression_**)** 表示非捕获组，并且该元素的 **(?:** 部分不能有嵌入空格。

trans-unit.source: The pattern **(? :**_subexpression_**)** throws an [ArgumentException](xref:System.ArgumentException) at run time because the regular expression engine can't parse the pattern, and the pattern **(? :**_subexpression_**)** fails to match *subexpression*.
trans-unit.target: 模式 **(? :**_subexpression_**)** 在运行时引发 [ArgumentException](xref:System.ArgumentException)，因为正则表达式引擎不能分析该模式，且模式 **(? :**_subexpression_**)** 不匹配 subexpression。

trans-unit.source: The language element **\p{**_name_**}**, which represents a Unicode category or named block, can't include embedded spaces in the **\p{** portion of the element.
trans-unit.target: 语言元素 **\p{**_name_**}** 表示一个 Unicode 类别或命名块，它不能在元素的 **\p{** 部分中包括嵌入空格。

trans-unit.source: If you do include a white space, the element throws an [ArgumentException](xref:System.ArgumentException) at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果你包括了空格，则该元素会在运行时引发 [ArgumentException](xref:System.ArgumentException) 异常。

trans-unit.source: Enabling this option helps simplify regular expressions that are often difficult to parse and to understand.
trans-unit.target: 启用此选项有助于简化通常很难分析和理解的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: It improves readability, and makes it possible to document a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 它提高了可读性，并可以记录正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines the following regular expression pattern:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义以下正则表达式模式：

trans-unit.source: `\b \(? ( (?>\w+) ,?\s? )+ [\.!?] \)? # Matches an entire sentence`.
trans-unit.target: `\b \(? ( (?>\w+) ,?\s? )+ [\.!?] \)? # Matches an entire sentence`。

trans-unit.source: This pattern is similar to the pattern defined in the [Explicit captures only](#explicit-captures-only) section, except that it uses the [RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace) option to ignore pattern white space.
trans-unit.target: 此模式与[仅显式捕获](#explicit-captures-only)部分中定义的模式相似，除非其使用 [RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace) 选项来忽略模式空格。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the inline option **(?x)** to ignore pattern white space.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用内联选项 **(?x)** 来忽略模式空白。

trans-unit.source: Right-to-left mode
trans-unit.target: 从右到左模式

trans-unit.source: By default, the regular expression engine searches from left to right.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，正则表达式引擎从左向右进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: You can reverse the search direction by using the [RegexOptions.RightToLeft](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft) option.
trans-unit.target: 可通过使用 [RegexOptions.RightToLeft](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft) 选项反转搜索方向。

trans-unit.source: The search automatically begins at the last character position of the string.
trans-unit.target: 搜索在字符串的最后一个字符位置自动开始。

trans-unit.source: For pattern-matching methods that include a starting position parameter, such as [Regex.Match(String, Int32)](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(System.String,System.Int32)), the starting position is the index of the rightmost character position at which the search is to begin.
trans-unit.target: 对于包括起始位置参数的模式匹配方法，例如 [Regex.Match(String, Int32)](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(System.String,System.Int32))，起始位置是最右边字符位置（即搜索开始位置）的索引。

trans-unit.source: Right-to-left pattern mode is available only by supplying the [RegexOptions.RightToLeft](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft) value to the options parameter of a [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) class constructor or static pattern-matching method.
trans-unit.target: 仅能通过将 [RegexOptions.RightToLeft](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft) 值提供给 [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 类构造函数或静态模式匹配方法的 options 参数来提供从右到左模式。

trans-unit.source: It is not available as an inline option.
trans-unit.target: 它不可作为内联选项使用。

trans-unit.source: The [RegexOptions.RightToLeft](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft) option changes the search direction only; it does not interpret the regular expression pattern from right to left.
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.RightToLeft](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.RightToLeft) 选项仅更改搜索方向；它不解释正则表达式模式是从右到左。

trans-unit.source: For example, the regular expression `\bb\w+\s` matches words that begin with the letter "b" and are followed by a white-space character.
trans-unit.target: 例如，正则表达式 `\bb\w+\s` 匹配以字母“b”开头的单词,且后跟一个空白字符。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the input string consists of three words that include one or more "b" characters.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，输入字符串由其中包括一个或多个“b”字符的三个单词组成。

trans-unit.source: The first word begins with "b", the second ends with "b", and the third includes two "b" characters in the middle of the word.
trans-unit.target: 第一个单词以“b”开头，第二个单词以“b”结尾，第三个单词的中间包括两个“b”字符。

trans-unit.source: As the output from the example shows, only the first word matches the regular expression pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如示例输出所示，只有第一个词与正则表达式模式匹配。

trans-unit.source: Also note that the lookahead assertion (the **(?**=_subexpression_**)** language element) and the lookbehind assertion (the **(?<**=_subexpression_**)** language element) do not change direction.
trans-unit.target: 另请注意，预测先行断言（**(?**=_subexpression_**)** 语言元素）和回顾后发断言（**(?<**=_subexpression_**)** 语言元素）不会更改方向。

trans-unit.source: The lookahead assertions look to the right; the lookbehind assertions look to the left.
trans-unit.target: 预测先行断言向右搜索；回顾后发断言向左搜索。

trans-unit.source: For example, the regular expression `(?<=\d{1,2}\s)\w+,?\s\d{4}` uses the lookbehind assertion to test for a date that precedes a month name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，正则表达式 `(?<=\d{1,2}\s)\w+,?\s\d{4}` 使用回顾后发断言测试月份名称前面的日期。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression then matches the month and the year.
trans-unit.target: 然后该正则表达式匹配月份和年份。

trans-unit.source: For information on lookahead and lookbehind assertsions, see [Grouping constructs in regular expressions](grouping.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关预测先行和回顾后发断言的信息，请参见[正则表达式中的分组构造](grouping.md)。

trans-unit.source: The regular expression pattern is defined as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式模式的定义如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Pattern
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The beginning of the match must be preceded by one or two decimal digits followed by a space.
trans-unit.target: 匹配项的开头必须有后跟一个空格的一个或两个十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: Match one or more word characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配一个或多个单词字符。

trans-unit.source: Match zero or one comma characters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配零个或一个逗号字符。

trans-unit.source: Match a white-space character.
trans-unit.target: 与空白字符匹配。

trans-unit.source: Match four decimal digits.
trans-unit.target: 匹配四个十进制数字。

trans-unit.source: ECMAScript matching behavior
trans-unit.target: ECMAScript 匹配行为

trans-unit.source: By default, the regular expression engine uses canonical behavior when matching a regular expression pattern to input text.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当正则表达式模式与输入文本匹配时，正则表达式引擎会采用规范行为。

trans-unit.source: However, you can instruct the regular expression engine to use ECMAScript matching behavior by specifying the [RegexOptions.ECMAScript](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ECMAScript) option.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以指示正则表达式引擎通过指定 [RegexOptions.ECMAScript](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ECMAScript) 选项使用 ECMAScript 匹配行为。

trans-unit.source: ECMAScript-compliant behavior is available only by supplying the [RegexOptions.ECMAScript](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ECMAScript) value to the options parameter of a [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) class constructor or static pattern-matching method.
trans-unit.target: 仅在通过将 [RegexOptions.ECMAScript](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ECMAScript) 值提供给 [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 类构造函数造函数或静态模式匹配方法的 options 参数后，符合 ECMAScript 的行为才可用。

trans-unit.source: It is not available as an inline option.
trans-unit.target: 它不可作为内联选项使用。

trans-unit.source: The [RegexOptions.ECMAScript](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ECMAScript) option can be combined only with the [RegexOptions.IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase) and [RegexOptions.Multiline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline) options.
trans-unit.target: [RegexOptions.ECMAScript](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.ECMAScript) 选项只能与 [RegexOptions.IgnoreCase](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.IgnoreCase) 和 [RegexOptions.Multiline](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.Multiline) 选项组合使用。

trans-unit.source: The use of any other option in a regular expression results in an [ArgumentOutOfRangeException](xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException).
trans-unit.target: 在正则表达式中使用其他选项会导致 [ArgumentOutOfRangeException](xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException)。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of ECMAScript and canonical regular expressions differs in three areas: character class syntax, self-referencing capturing groups, and octal versus backreference interpretation.
trans-unit.target: ECMAScript 和规范化正则表达式的行为在三个方面不同：字符类语法、自引用捕获组和八进制与反向引用的解释。

trans-unit.source: Character class syntax.
trans-unit.target: 字符类语法。

trans-unit.source: Because canonical regular expressions support Unicode whereas ECMAScript does not, character classes in ECMAScript have a more limited syntax, and some character class language elements have a different meaning.
trans-unit.target: 因为规范的正则表达式支持 Unicode，却不支持 ECMAScript，ECMAScript 中的字符类具有一个受限更多的语法且某些字符类语言元素具有不同的含义。

trans-unit.source: For example, ECMAScript does not support language elements such as the Unicode category or block elements *\p* and **\P**.
trans-unit.target: 例如，ECMAScript 不支持语言元素（例如 Unicode 类别或块元素 \p 和 **\P**）。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the **\w** element, which matches a word character, is equivalent to the **[a-zA-Z_0-9]** character class when using ECMAScript and **[\p{Ll}\p{Lu}\p{Lt}\p{Lo}\p{Nd}\p{Pc}\p{Lm}]** when using canonical behavior.
trans-unit.target: 同样，使用 ECMAScript 时，与单词字符匹配的 **\w** 元素等效于 **[a-zA-Z_0-9]** 字符类，使用规范化行为时，该元素等效于 **[\p{Ll}\p{Lu}\p{Lt}\p{Lo}\p{Nd}\p{Pc}\p{Lm}]**。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Character classes in regular expressions](classes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见[正则表达式中的字符类](classes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the difference between canonical and ECMAScript pattern matching.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例阐释了规范化与 ECMAScript 模式匹配之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: It defines a regular expression, `\b(\w+\s*)+`, that matches words followed by white-space characters.
trans-unit.target: 它定义了正则表达式 `\b(\w+\s*)+`，该表达式与后跟空白字符的单词匹配。

trans-unit.source: The input consists of two strings, one that uses the Latin character set and the other that uses the Cyrillic character set.
trans-unit.target: 由两个字符串组成的输入，其中一个字符串使用拉丁字符集，另一个则使用西里尔字符集。

trans-unit.source: As the output shows, the call to the [Regex.IsMatch(String, String, RegexOptions)](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch(System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions)) method that uses ECMAScript matching fails to match the Cyrillic words, whereas the method call that uses canonical matching does match these words.
trans-unit.target: 如输出所示，对使用 ECMAScript 匹配的 [Regex.IsMatch(String, String, RegexOptions)](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch(System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions)) 方法的调用无法与西里尔文的单词匹配，而使用规范化匹配的方法调用与这些单词也不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Self-referencing capturing groups.
trans-unit.target: 自引用捕获组。

trans-unit.source: A regular expression capture class with a backreference to itself must be updated with each capture iteration.
trans-unit.target: 自身具有后向引用的正则表达式捕获类必须在每次捕获迭代时得到更新。

trans-unit.source: As the following example shows, this feature enables the regular expression `((a+)(\1) ?)+` to match the input string " aa aaaa aaaaaa " when using ECMAScript, but not when using canonical matching.
trans-unit.target: 如以下示例所示，此功能将在使用 ECMAScript 时使正则表达式 `((a+)(\1) ?)+` 与输入字符串“aa aaaa aaaaaa”匹配，但在使用规范化匹配时则不会匹配。

trans-unit.source: For more information about string comparisons that are case-sensitive and that use the invariant culture, see [Best Practices for Using Strings](best-practices.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关区分大小写和使用固定区域性的字符串比较的更多信息，请参见[针对使用字符串的最佳做法](best-practices.md)。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the case-insensitive comparisons of the current culture, you can specify the [RegexOptions.CultureInvariant](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.CultureInvariant) option to ignore cultural differences in language and to use the conventions of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 不使用当前区域性的不区分大小写比较，可以指定 [RegexOptions.CultureInvariant](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.CultureInvariant) 选项忽略语言的区域性差异，并使用固定区域性的约定。

trans-unit.source: Comparison using the invariant culture is available only by supplying the [RegexOptions.CultureInvariant](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.CultureInvariant) value to the options parameter of a [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) class constructor or static pattern-matching method.
trans-unit.target: 仅能通过将 [RegexOptions.CultureInvariant](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.CultureInvariant) 值提供给 [Regex](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex) 类构造函数或静态模式匹配方法的 options 参数来提供使用固定区域性的比较。

trans-unit.source: It is not available as an inline option.
trans-unit.target: 它不可作为内联选项使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example is identical to the previous example, except that the static [Regex.IsMatch(String, String, RegexOptions)](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch(System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions)) method is called with options that include [RegexOptions.CultureInvariant](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.CultureInvariant).
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例与上一示例相等，不同之处是下面的示例使用包含 [RegexOptions.CultureInvariant](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions.CultureInvariant) 的选项调用静态 [Regex.IsMatch(String, String, RegexOptions)](xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch(System.String,System.String,System.Text.RegularExpressions.RegexOptions)) 方法。

trans-unit.source: Even when the current culture is set to Turkish (Turkey), the regular expression engine is able to successfully match "FILE" and "file" and block access to the file resource.
trans-unit.target: 即使设置当前区域性到土耳其语（土耳其），正则表达式引擎仍能够成功匹配“FILE”和“file”并能阻止对文件资源的访问。

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: [Regular expression language - quick reference](quick-ref.md)
trans-unit.target: [正则表达式语言 - 快速参考](quick-ref.md)
